comments:
Create a dynamic web project.  Click run on server.  Select an IBM WebSphere 6.0 manual creation, and hit finish from first page of the wizard.  An error dialog pops up, now when you hit finish or cancel, you always get this class cast so there is no way to kill the wizard from taking over your workbench unless you shutdown and restart.

I still problems here.  If I try and hit finish from the first page like in the original defect for IBM server, I get a null pointer dialogue.  I close that and now every button, next, finish cancel gives this error and I have to close the workbench because the wizard won't go away.
